title: Create Dolt block_links table
goal: Enable storing directed edges (relationships) between memory blocks.
action_items: [ ] Define the `block_links` table schema using Dolt SQL, based on the second part of `project.schemas.dolt_sql`.
[ ] Verify columns (`from_id`, `to_id`, `relation`), primary key, and foreign key constraints match the schema.
[ ] Commit the table schema to Dolt (`dolt add .`, `dolt commit -m 'Create block_links table'`).
test_criteria: Manually insert links between existing sample blocks via Dolt SQL (`dolt sql -q 'INSERT INTO block_links ...'`).
Verify the table structure (`dolt schema show block_links`).
Query links for a specific block (`dolt sql -q 'SELECT to_id FROM block_links WHERE from_id = ...'`).
